name: Keep It Together | GMTK Game Jam 2021
name_original: Keep It Together | GMTK Game Jam 2021
description: Bob the blob is very lonely, but joined together with his friends he has the power to survive. Dodge lasers, bombs and enemies or use them to your advantage to beat your high score! We really enjoyed making this game for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 and we hope you like it too.
